snippet: Geneticists using new statistical approaches have taken a first shot at identifying and dating the major population mixture events of the past 4,000 years.
abstract: Geneticists applying new statistical approaches have tried to identify and date major population mixture events of last 4,000 years with goal of providing new source of information for historians; genetic atlas of human mixing events is published in journal Science.
lead_paragraph: Geneticists using new statistical approaches have taken a first shot at identifying and dating the major population mixture events of the past 4,000 years.

headline.main: Tracing Ancestry, Researchers Produce a Genetic Atlas of Human Mixing Events
headline.print_headline: Tracing Ancestry, Researchers Produce a Genetic Atlas of Human Mixing Events
